mapper.select: SELECT smb.msg_id as msgId ,smld.msg_sbst as msgSbst FROM SYS_MSG_BAS smb INNER JOIN SYS_MSG_LANG_DTL smld ON smb.sys_div_cd = smld.sys_div_cd AND smb.msg_type_cd = smld.msg_type_cd AND smb.msg_id = smld.msg_id WHERE smb.use_yn = 'Y' AND smb.sys_div_cd = #{sysDivCd} AND smb.msg_type_cd = #{msgTypeCd} AND smld.lang_cd = #{langCd}
